attributes.action: Increase the Travel - mileage and fuel rates and allowances
attributes.background: Amend the government guidance and increase allowance for tax relief on claims for mileage and fuel rates as this hasn’t altered since 2012 and as costs are rapidly rising individuals and businesses are struggling, 0.45 a mile is not enough.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for related actions:

Increase the HMRC Mileage Rate from 45p/mile to 60p/mile
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/600966

Increase the tax-free approved Mileage Allowance Payment rate and review yearly
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/601286
